title: Deadlock in Multi-threading
description: A system freeze occurred when multiple threads attempted to acquire shared resources at the same time.
verdict: Deadlock detected due to circular wait, mutual exclusion, and no preemption.

evidence.label: Clue 1
evidence.title: Multiple threads requested locks
evidence.description: Each thread acquired one resource and waited for another.

evidence.label: Clue 2
evidence.title: Circular wait detected
evidence.description: Thread A waited for Thread B, while Thread B waited for Thread A.

evidence.label: Clue 3
evidence.title: No preemption policy
evidence.description: Resources could not be forcibly taken from threads.

title: Race Condition in Banking App
description: Simultaneous transactions caused inconsistent account balances.
verdict: Race condition occurred due to unsynchronized access to shared data.

evidence.label: Clue 1
evidence.title: Simultaneous access
evidence.description: Two transactions accessed the same account at the same time.

evidence.label: Clue 2
evidence.title: Incorrect balance
evidence.description: The account balance did not reflect the correct total after transactions.

title: Deadlock in Database Transactions
description: Two database transactions locked resources in a conflicting order, causing a complete halt.
verdict: Deadlock occurred due to circular waiting and lack of proper transaction ordering.

evidence.label: Clue 1
evidence.title: Transaction locks
evidence.description: Transaction X locked table A and waited for table B, while Transaction Y locked table B and waited for table A.

evidence.label: Clue 2
evidence.title: Deadlock detection
evidence.description: Database detected a cycle in the wait-for graph.

evidence.label: Clue 3
evidence.title: Rollback
evidence.description: One transaction was rolled back to resolve the deadlock.
